title: Fact Check: Old picture from Prayagraj shared as buses arranged by Priyanka Gandhi to ferry migrants | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A picture of a fleet of buses is being shared on social media with a claim that it is of the buses arranged by Congress leader Priyanka Gandhi to ferry migrants stranded in various parts of the country amid the coronavirus-induced lockdown.

You can find more posts here, here and here.

NewsMobile fact-checked the above picture and found that it is OLD.

On putting the image through Reverse Image search, we found an article by NDTV dated February 28, 2019, titled, “At Kumbh Mela, UP Eyes Guinness Record For “Largest Parade Of Buses.”

According to an article published by Financial Express, UP Government created a Guinness Record for the largest parade of buses. A total of 500 buses with the Kumbh logo were used to make the record. The buses covered a stretch of 3.2 km in Prayagraj.

Meanwhile, on May 18, the UP government accepted Priyanka Gandhi Vadra’s offer of 1,000 buses to transport migrant workers.

From the above information, we can deduce that the picture in question is old and is NOT related to Priyanka Gandhi’s recent offer of 1,000 buses to transport migrant workers.
